name: Brick Breaker Smasher - Arcade Fun Game Free
name_original: Brick Breaker Smasher - Arcade Fun Game Free
description:
Do you like Brick games!! than you will enjoy our new Brick Breaker Arcade Game.

Brick Breaker is a unique way to play and chalenging
in a cool colorful bricks and backgrounds.
Its a fun arcade game that is loved equally by kids and adults

Experience the cartoon style brick breaking game that sets a new standard of fun over any break out style game you’ve ever played!

FEATURES:
- 100 levels of bricks
- 6 Chapters to complete
- lots of power ups
- 10 lives to start
- no more lives "10 sec a new live free"

-Download now, and try the Fun Arcade Brick game, and start having fun.

The game is easy and fun to play, once you download this Free App its easy to learn within minutes.
To win this game you need to break the Bricks and finish all the 6 chapters, as you start moving up levels the game get m ore difficult,
your up to the challenge!!!
Download now and Lets get started :)

Need any technical support with our Brick Breaker game, email us:info@simpelapps.ca
